A2AAgentCardInfo.description: Information to override default values in the A2A Agent card.

url.description: URL of the A2A Agent. Use if you want to override the real URL of the A2A Agent, eg. when running behind a proxy or load balancer.

A2AAgentCardInfo.title: A2AAgentCardInfo

A2AAgentSkill.description: Information to override default values in the A2A Agent skill.

name.description: Name of the A2A Agent skill.

description.description: Description of the A2A Agent skill.

tags.description: Tags of the A2A Agent skill.

examples.description: Examples of the A2A Agent skill.

A2AAgentSkill.title: A2AAgentSkill

A2AAgentSkills.description: Skills info to override default values in the A2A Agent card.

generate_ui_components.description: `generate_ui_components` skill info to override default values in the A2A Agent card.

A2AAgentSkills.title: A2AAgentSkills

agent_card.description: Information to override default values in the A2A Agent card.

skills.description: Skills info to override default values in the A2A Agent card.

AgentConfigComponent.description: Agent Configuration - one component config for data type.

component.description: Component name. Can be name of existing dynamic component supported by the UI Agent, or name for hand-build component.

configuration.description: Optional pre-configuration of the dynamic component to be used.

AgentConfigComponent.title: AgentConfigComponent

AgentConfigDataType.description: Agent Configuration for the Data Type.

data_transformer.description: Transformer to use to transform the input data of this type. Available transformers: `json`, `yaml`, `csv-comma`, `csv-semicolon`, `csv-tab`. Other transformers can be installed, see docs.

generate_all_fields.description: If `True`, the agent will generate all possible view Fields for the UI component into its output configuration `UIBlockComponentMetadata.fields_all`, if `False` then all fields aren't generated, if `None` then agent's default setting is used. Supported only for `table` and `set-of-cards` components.

components.description: List of components to select from for the input data of this type.

AgentConfigDataType.title: AgentConfigDataType

AgentConfigDynamicComponentConfiguration.description: Agent Configuration - pre-configuration of the one dynamic component for data type.

title.description: Title of the dynamic component to be shown in the UI

fields.description: Fields of the dynamic component to be shown in the UI

AgentConfigDynamicComponentConfiguration.title: AgentConfigDynamicComponentConfiguration

id.description: Unique field ID. Can be used in CSS selectors to target the field, eg. to set its style, or during live refresh of the shown data from the backend.

name.description: Field name to be shown in the UI

data_path.description: JSON Path pointing to the input data structure (after input data transformation and JSON wrapping, if applied). It is used to pickup values to be shown in the UI.

component_system.description: Component system to use to render the UI component. Default is `json`. UI renderers have to be installed to use other systems.

data_transformer.description: Transformer used to parse the input data (can be overriden on 'data type' level). Default `json`, available transformers: `yaml`, `csv-comma`, `csv-semicolon`, `csv-tab`. Other transformers can be installed, see docs.

component_selection_strategy.description: Strategy for LLM powered component selection and configuration step. Possible values: `one_llm_call` (default) - uses one LLM call, `two_llm_calls` - use two LLM calls - experimental!

data_types.description: Mapping from `InputData.type` to UI component - currently only one dynamic component with pre-configuration, or hand-build component (aka HBC) can be defined here. Will be extended in the future.

input_data_json_wrapping.description: If `True` (default), the agent will wrap the JSON input data into data type field if necessary due to its structure. If `False`, the agent will never wrap the JSON input data into data type field.

generate_all_fields.description: If `True`, the agent will generate all possible view Fields for the UI component into its output configuration `UIBlockComponentMetadata.fields_all`, if `False` then all fields aren't generated. Can be overriden for individual `data_types`. Supported only for `table` and `set-of-cards` components.
